newsitem.title: UK: Ladbroke no comment on Capital bid talk.
newsitem.headline: Ladbroke no comment on Capital bid talk.

text.p: Ladbroke Group Plc declined comment on Tuesday on speculation it would intervene in the takeover battle for Capital Corporation Plc.
British casino operator London Clubs International Plc on Monday launched a 181 million pound bid for Capital.
Capital operates London casinos Crockfords and the Colony Club. There has been speculation that Ladbroke, which is looking to add to its casino portfolio, might enter the bidding.
However, some analysts say that the London Clubs offer is already fully priced.
